vsParam:
Yes, it can't be wrong...
That's about the "glowing flower"!
Turns out there are clues in this world too!

Yes. This book has related contents...
I want to find this flower.

The book also indicates the place where the flower blooms.
I am looking for the map to get me there...

Uh-huh... Let us show you the way!
It's not safe for you to go alone!

Yes! There might be monsters.
You don't need to thank us!

Boo-hoo... Thank you.
With you guys around, I am more confident!

Hee hee, then it's settled!
Will you use the glowing flower to make medicines?

Ah, no...
That flower may lead me to my younger sister.
What? The flower is a clue? What do you mean?
Does your younger sister like this flower?

Er... I am not sure...
She likes all kinds of flowers, but this one is different...

Hmm... Although it's a magical flower,
I don't know much about it

because it's very rare.
I only that it might be a clue...

I see... In that case,
we must see it with our eyes!

That's right. Let's hurry up. The flowers are blooming
in this season, we can't miss it!

Ah, that... flower... is glowing!
That's it!

Wait, Ayesha!
There are monsters over there!

Chase them away,
or they'll ruin the flowers!

Phew... Finally, all monsters are chased away!
Okay, Ayesha, did you find any clue on that flower?

Er... It's just glowing, and nothing happens...
Maybe it's not what I want...

"Nothing happens"? So the flower you are looking for
possess some kind of special power, right?

Yes. I will find my younger sister in the place where
the "glowing flower" blooms, maybe talk to her...
Hmm? Is... is your younger sister a ghost or something?

Hey, what nonsense! You stupid fairy!
How could you say that!

Ah... never mind.
I thought it was a dream at the beginning.

But now, I firmly believe that
my younger sister is alive.

Although this flower is not the clue I wanted...
I won't give up until I find her.

It explains everything... If we hear any news about the
"glowing flower", we'll tell you immediately!

Yes. Thank you, Peppermint.
Thanks, guys!
